review: The Amazon Fire exceeded my expectations in its ease of installation and operating convenience.  The voice recognition feature is impressive for a product of this cost and size.I wish that Amazon would add "Acorn TV" to the media provider list.  We prefer the British TV series to the TV series that are currently offered by the current media providers.
